page.title: 18Games We Play Today
page.content: When we go out to games we sometimes play stoolball.The equipment we use is two blue posts which measure 140cms they have white boards at the top which measure 30cms by 30cms.We also use two bats with round heads which measure lengh 22cm and width 18cm. We use a tennis ball as it is softer than a hard ball. How to play the game _______________________ You have two teams one side bats and the other side fields one is bowler.The bowler has six throws at the batter who has to protect the white board with his bat.If he hits the ball far enough he can get runs for his team.He can be caught out or run out. J.Tompkinson & V.Scourfield age 10.
